title: Israeli air strike destroys part of last functioning hospital in Gaza City
snippets: The Israel Defense Forces said the hospital contained a "command and control center used by Hamas".
summary: The Israel Defense Forces have reported that a hospital was being used by Hamas as a "command and control center." This statement implies a military function was being carried out within a civilian healthcare facility, according to the IDF's claim.
titles: Israeli air strike destroys part of last functioning hospital in Gaza City

The showdown between the Northern Irishman and DeChambeau highlights McIlroy's quest for a significant career achievement.
titles: Golf: Rory McIlroy leads the Masters; closes in on career Grand Slam

title: Trump exempts smartphones and computers from new tariffs
snippets: It follows concerns that tech prices could skyrocket, as many gadgets are made in China, with the US president saying he will give more detail on Monday.
The latest exemptions cover imports from China, in first sign of possible softening of US trade war against Beijing.
Financial markets have been roiled since President Trump imposed stiff tariffs on China, where Apple and other tech companies make many of their products.
summary: The US has announced exemptions on certain imports from China, signaling a potential softening in the trade war with Beijing. This development comes amid concerns that tech prices might increase due to the tariffs imposed by President Trump, as many gadgets are manufactured in China. The move has affected financial markets significantly. The President has stated more details will be provided on Monday.
titles: Trump exempts smartphones and computers from new tariffs
Trump exempts smartphones, computers from ‘reciprocal’ tariffs
Trump exempts phones, computers, chips from new tariffs

title: UFC 314 takeaways: Sorry, folks — Paddy Pimblett must be taken seriously after breaking Michael Chandler
snippets: From the crowning of a new (old) 145-pound champ to star-making performances for a few members of the next generation, UFC 314 delivered in Miami on Saturday night.
summary: UFC 314 in Miami saw the return of a previous champion to the 145-pound title and highlighted the rise of several new stars on Saturday night. The event delivered on expectations with significant performances across the board.
titles: UFC 314 takeaways: Sorry, folks — Paddy Pimblett must be taken seriously after breaking Michael Chandler

title: Oscar Piastri can take charge of the Formula 1 title race from pole position in Bahrain
snippets: Oscar Piastri can seize the initiative in the Formula 1 title race as he starts on pole position for the Bahrain Grand Prix on Sunday with his teammate Lando Norris and champion Max Verstappen both further down the grid.  Piastri held off an unexpected challenge from Mercedes driver George Russell to take pole in qualifying Saturday in a sign McLaren is still the F1 team to beat in 2025.  A team mix up cost Russell and Mercedes teammate Kimi Antonelli each one spot on the grid after penalties were imposed after the qualifying session.
summary: Oscar Piastri, driving for McLaren, secured pole position for the Bahrain Grand Prix, indicating McLaren's continued dominance in Formula 1 as of 2025. During Saturday's qualifying, Piastri outperformed George Russell of Mercedes, placing himself in a favorable position to advance in the title race. His teammate, Lando Norris, and reigning champion, Max Verstappen, will start further back. A team error led to penalties for Mercedes drivers George Russell and Kimi Antonelli, each losing one grid spot post-qualifying.
titles: Oscar Piastri can take charge of the Formula 1 title race from pole position in Bahrain

This development underscores the growing trade ties between Latin America and China, with the former increasing its exports to meet the latter's rising demand for food products.
titles: Trump’s China trade war a ‘boon’ for Brazil but sends US farmers reeling

title: Trump exempts smartphones from ‘reciprocal’ tariffs after market rout
snippets: Dispensation is first sign of softening of levies against China and provides a big boost for Apple
summary: The U.S. government has begun to soften its tariff policies against China, marking a significant shift by granting dispensations. This change has notably benefited Apple, providing a substantial boost to the company. This move is the first sign of easing in the previously stringent levies imposed on Chinese imports.
titles: Trump exempts smartphones from ‘reciprocal’ tariffs after market rout

title: Trump chaos prompts top Canadian and Danish pension funds to cool on US
snippets: Rethink comes as tariffs and talk of territorial expansion stoke market instability and geopolitical tension
summary: In response to increasing market instability and geopolitical tension, driven by tariffs and discussions of territorial expansion, there is a reconsideration of strategies and policies. This reassessment aims to address the economic and political challenges arising from these factors.
titles: Trump chaos prompts top Canadian and Danish pension funds to cool on US
